item.description:
MARCH WINEDOWN

featuring readings by entrants to the Harvard Book Store Short Shorts Writing Contest

In honor of February, our shortest month, Harvard Book Store is hosting a Short Shorts Writing Contest, an opportunity for writers to submit their pithiest short stories (500 words or less). To celebrate their accomplishments in the micro-fiction arts, tonight we will gather for wine, conversation, and readings of contributed stories. And to top the night off, you can purchase a copy of the as-yet-to-be-titled collection of entries that we will print using our very own in-store print-on-demand machine, Paige M. Gutenborg.
item.how_to_find_us: No organizer will be present. See message below.
item.name: Winedown @ Harvard Book Store
